  3: module Data.ByteString.Lazy.Char8_LHAssumptions where
  4: 
  5: import Data.ByteString.Lazy hiding (hGetNonBlocking, scanl)
  6: import Data.ByteString.Lazy.Char8
  7: import Data.ByteString.Lazy_LHAssumptions()

  9: {-@
 10: assume Data.ByteString.Lazy.Char8.last :: { bs : Data.ByteString.Lazy.ByteString | 1 <= bllen bs } -> GHC.Types.Char
 11: 
 12: assume Data.ByteString.Lazy.Char8.singleton
 13:     :: GHC.Types.Char -> { bs : Data.ByteString.Lazy.ByteString | bllen bs == 1 }
 14: 
 15: assume Data.ByteString.Lazy.Char8.pack
 16:     :: w8s : [GHC.Types.Char]
 17:     -> { bs : Data.ByteString.Lazy.ByteString | bllen bs == len w8s }
 18: 
 19: assume Data.ByteString.Lazy.Char8.unpack
 20:     :: bs : Data.ByteString.Lazy.ByteString
 21:     -> { w8s : [GHC.Types.Char] | len w8s == bllen bs }
 22: 
 23: assume Data.ByteString.Lazy.Char8.cons
 24:     :: GHC.Types.Char
 25:     -> i : Data.ByteString.Lazy.ByteString
 26:     -> { o : Data.ByteString.Lazy.ByteString | bllen o == bllen i + 1 }
 27: 
 28: assume Data.ByteString.Lazy.Char8.snoc
 29:     :: i : Data.ByteString.Lazy.ByteString
 30:     -> GHC.Types.Char
 31:     -> { o : Data.ByteString.Lazy.ByteString | bllen o == bllen i + 1 }
 32:

 34:     :: { bs : Data.ByteString.Lazy.ByteString | 1 <= bllen bs }
 35:     -> GHC.Types.Char
 36: 
 37: assume Data.ByteString.Lazy.Char8.uncons
 38:     :: i : Data.ByteString.Lazy.ByteString

 40:

 42:     :: i : Data.ByteString.Lazy.ByteString

 44:

 46:     :: (GHC.Types.Char -> GHC.Types.Char)
 47:     -> i : Data.ByteString.Lazy.ByteString
 48:     -> { o : Data.ByteString.Lazy.ByteString | bllen o == bllen i }
 49: 
 50: assume Data.ByteString.Lazy.Char8.intersperse
 51:     :: GHC.Types.Char
 52:     -> i : Data.ByteString.Lazy.ByteString
 53:     -> { o : Data.ByteString.Lazy.ByteString | (bllen i == 0 <=> bllen o == 0) && (1 <= bllen i <=> bllen o == 2 * bllen i - 1) }
 54:

127:     :: (GHC.Types.Char -> GHC.Types.Bool)
128:     -> i : Data.ByteString.Lazy.ByteString

130:

174:     :: is : [Data.ByteString.Lazy.ByteString]
175:     -> { o : Data.ByteString.Lazy.ByteString | (len is == 0 <=> bllen o == 0) && bllen o >= len is }
176: 
177: assume Data.ByteString.Lazy.Char8.unwords
178:     :: is : [Data.ByteString.Lazy.ByteString]
179:     -> { o : Data.ByteString.Lazy.ByteString | (len is == 0 ==> bllen o == 0) && (1 <= len is ==> bllen o >= len is - 1) }

232:     :: l : Data.ByteString.Lazy.ByteString
233:     -> r : Data.ByteString.Lazy.ByteString
234:     -> { o : [(GHC.Types.Char, GHC.Types.Char)] | len o <= bllen l && len o <= bllen r }
235: 
236: assume Data.ByteString.Lazy.Char8.zipWith
237:     :: (GHC.Types.Char -> GHC.Types.Char -> a)
238:     -> l : Data.ByteString.Lazy.ByteString
239:     -> r : Data.ByteString.Lazy.ByteString
240:     -> { o : [a] | len o <= bllen l && len o <= bllen r }

243:     :: i : [(GHC.Types.Char, GHC.Types.Char)]
244:     -> ( { l : Data.ByteString.Lazy.ByteString | bllen l == len i }
245:        , { r : Data.ByteString.Lazy.ByteString | bllen r == len i }
246:        )

248: assume Data.ByteString.Lazy.ReadInt.readInt
249:     :: i : Data.ByteString.Lazy.ByteString
250:     -> Maybe { p : (Int, { o : Data.ByteString.Lazy.ByteString | bllen o < bllen i}) | bllen i /= 0 }

253:     :: i : Data.ByteString.Lazy.ByteString
